dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Base map: The Rand-McNally new commercial atlas map of Mexico. c1914. Text on Mexican events, 1913-1914, with war figures and statistics on the United States Army and Navy, and on the Mexican Army and Navy, as well as a map of North America from "The Rand-McNally new commercial atlas," c1912, on verso. Includes index.
